content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill is not connected to any inserter or belt
-  Stone furnace at position (x=60.0 y=-60.0) has no ingredients

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Offshore pump is working
-  Boiler has no fuel
-  Steam engine is not connected to any power source

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5 y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Both transport belts are working
-  No inserter or other entities are connected to the transport belts

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors due to lack of fuel
-  Ensure that boilers and burner mining drills have sufficient fuel to operate
-  Connect a fuel source to the boiler and burner mining drills

### Errors due to lack of ingredients
-  Ensure that stone furnaces have sufficient ingredients to operate
-  Connect a source of ingredients to the stone furnace

### Errors due to lack of connection
-  Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source
-  Connect the steam engine to a power source, such as a boiler or a solar panel

### Errors due to empty or full pipe groups
-  Ensure that pipe groups are not empty or full
-  Connect a source or sink to the pipe group to prevent it from becoming empty or full

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent.
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
